parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword or phrase

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Type of search results to return

parameters.name: max_pages
parameters.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch

returns.description: List of tweets matching the search criteria

crawlers.description: Fetch tweets posted by a specific user

parameters.name: screen_name
parameters.description: Twitter handle without '@'

parameters.name: max_pages
parameters.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch

returns.description: List of tweets posted by the specified user

crawlers.description: Fetch trending topics for a specific country

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country name to fetch trends for

returns.description: List of trending topics in the specified country

crawlers.description: Fetch followers of a specific user

parameters.name: screen_name
parameters.description: Twitter handle without '@'

parameters.name: max_pages
parameters.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch

returns.description: List of users following the specified user

crawlers.description: Fetch comments for a specific tweet.

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The ID of the tweet to fetch comments for

parameters.name: max_pages
parameters.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch

returns.description: List of comments for the specified tweet

analysis.description: Cleans and filters raw Twitter (X) data based on user intent by selecting only relevant fields.

parameters.name: tweet_data
parameters.description: Raw tweet data as a list of dictionaries, typically retrieved from X/Twitter API.

parameters.name: user_request
parameters.description: A natural language request describing what kind of data or fields the user is interested in.

returns.description: Cleaned tweet data containing only the fields relevant to the user's request.

interactive.description: Post a new tweet to X (Twitter)

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The text content of the tweet (max 280 characters)

returns.description: Result of posting the tweet including status and tweet ID

interactive.description: Upload media and post a tweet with it

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The text content of the tweet (max 280 characters)

parameters.name: media_path
parameters.description: Path to the media file to upload

returns.description: Result of posting the tweet with media including status and tweet ID

interactive.description: Delete a tweet with the specified ID

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The ID of the tweet to delete

returns.description: Result of the tweet deletion operation

interactive.description: Send a direct message to a user on X (Twitter)

parameters.name: recipient_id
parameters.description: The user ID of the recipient

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The text content of the direct message (max 280 characters)

returns.description: Result of sending the direct message

interactive.description: Reply to an existing tweet on X (Twitter)

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The ID of the tweet to reply to

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The text content of the reply (max 280 characters)

returns.description: Result of posting the reply including status and tweet ID

interactive.description: Follow a user with the specified ID

parameters.name: target_user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to follow

interactive.description: Like a tweet with the specified ID

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The ID of the tweet to like

interactive.description: Unlike a tweet with the specified ID

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The ID of the tweet to unlike

interactive.description: Retweet a tweet with the specified ID

parameters.name: tweet_id
parameters.description: The ID of the tweet to retweet
